name: Secret Garden (itch) (eternalthinker)
description:
Explore a mysterious garden. Can you get out? Do you want to get out?

Controls:

  • WASD /  Left stick: Move
  • E / Button South: Interact, Dismiss dialogue, Continue
  • Left Click / Right Trigger: Perform action/attack (when an item is equipped)

Credits:

  • Art & Programming: Rahul Anand
  • Music: FreeMusicArchive.org
  • Sound effects: Freesound.org, jsfxr
